{"step_by_step_thinking": "The relevant documents suggest that implementing a professional practice model (PPM) can have positive effects on cost per patient day, sick time, turnover rates, and job satisfaction indicators. The introduction of a clinical nurse specialist (CNS) role into a functioning patient care setting has also been shown to be efficacious to both nursing staff and nurse managers. Additionally, the development of a skilled and educated assistant for trained nurses is seen as an urgent necessity. Given these positive outcomes, it can be inferred that clinical supervision can indeed sustain our workforce in the current healthcare landscape.", "answer_choice": "A"}
